Name: Power
Arduino: Each pin is 3.3V tolerant and can source/sink no more than 7mA/10mA
Port: Each cluster of I/O pins can source 46mA and sink 65mA.  Clusters are defined as Yellow Pink Green Blue Red and Orange outlines.

Name: Serial
Arduino: Only Ports with * can be configured to do I2C
Port: To use USB host set PIN_USB_HOST_ENABLE high

Name: TC - Timer Counter
Timer: G or H at any time
